title: Fix `milvus_memory_test.py` mock `Config`
body:
### Background
<!-- Provide a concise overview of the rationale behind this change. Include relevant context, prior discussions, or links to related issues. Ensure that the change aligns with the project's overall direction. -->
```python
FAILED tests/milvus_memory_test.py::TestMilvusMemory::test_add - AttributeError: type object 'MockConfig' has no attribute 'milvus_secure'
FAILED tests/milvus_memory_test.py::TestMilvusMemory::test_clear - AttributeError: type object 'MockConfig' has no attribute 'milvus_secure'
FAILED tests/milvus_memory_test.py::TestMilvusMemory::test_get - AttributeError: type object 'MockConfig' has no attribute 'milvus_secure'
FAILED tests/milvus_memory_test.py::TestMilvusMemory::test_get_relevant - AttributeError: type object 'MockConfig' has no attribute 'milvus_secure'
FAILED tests/milvus_memory_test.py::TestMilvusMemory::test_get_stats - AttributeError: type object 'MockConfig' has no attribute 'milvus_secure'
```

### Changes
<!-- Describe the specific, focused change made in this pull request. Detail the modifications clearly and avoid any unrelated or "extra" changes. -->
Adopt approach used in `tests/unit/test_plugins.py`

### Documentation
<!-- Explain how your changes are documented, such as in-code comments or external documentation. Ensure that the documentation is clear, concise, and easy to understand. -->
